metadata.title: CVE-2024-21201 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description: Vulnerability in the MySQL Server product of Oracle MySQL (component:Server: Optimizer).  Supported versions that are affected are 8.0.39 andprior, 8.4.2 and prior and  9.0.1 and prior. Easily exploitablevulnerability allows high privileged attacker with network access viamultiple protocols to compromise MySQL Server.  Successful attacks of thisvulnerability can result in unauthorized ability to cause a hang orfrequently repeatable crash (complete DOS) of MySQL Server. CVSS 3.1 BaseScore 4.9 (Availability impacts).  CVSS Vector:(CVSS:3.1/AV:N/AC:L/PR:H/UI:N/S:U/C:N/I:N/A:H).

criterions.comment: mysql-8.0 package in oracular is affected and needs fixing.
mariadb package in oracular is affected and may need fixing.
